text: Avdey () is a rural locality (a selo) in Shishkinskoye Rural Settlement of Chitinsky District, Zabaykalsky Krai, Russia. The population was 179 as of 2010. There are 7 streets. == Geography == The village is located on the right bank of the Chita River in 45 km north-east from Chita and 9 km from Shishkino village. == Ethnicity == The village is inhabited by Buryats, Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zabaykalsky Krai
title: Avdey, Russia
